Trade/Device Name(s): Healgen Amphetamine Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Healgen Oxycodone Test (Strip, Cassette, Cup, Dip Card)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Healgen Amphetamine and Oxycodone Tests, lateral flow immunochromatographic urine drug screening assays in strip, cassette, dip card, and cup formats
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative, preliminary determination of amphetamine (cutoff 1000 ng/mL) and oxycodone (cutoff 100 ng/mL) in human urine for in vitro diagnostic use, available OTC and by prescription, results should be confirmed by alternative chemical methods
